name: Cosmy Chimp - The flappy story of a monkey bird
name_original: Cosmy Chimp - The flappy story of a monkey bird
description:
This is the story of a little chimpanzee who wanted to cross the universe. One day, a famous bird sent him a snap to show him how to fly. The name of this bird was Flappy.

Tap the screen to make the chimp fly. Avoid the big rocks to explore the universe.
Beat your friends high scores and share it on Facebook.

Bronze medal: 10 bananas
Silver medal: 20 bananas
Gold medal: 50 bananas
Cosmy medal bronze: 100 bananas
Cosmy medal silver: 250 bananas
Cosmy medal gold: 500 bananas
